doc.title: Airman
doc.plot: A story that follows the trials of Conor Broekhart, a young man who was born in a hot-air balloon, and who has been raised in the court of the kind and honorable King Nick. Conor, however, finds himself framed for the king's murder, and is sent to an island prison to serve his term. When he is escapes, Conor must decide must decide whether to join the plot to overthrow the new government, or to turn his back on those who betrayed him.
